item.title: Limpet teeth are found to be strongest natural material on Earth
item.author: Emma S Lisle,
item.description: Engineers believe they may have found the strongest natural material on Earth – limpet teeth. Research conducted at the University of Portsmouth has revealed that the teeth of these small aquatic creatures are so strong they could be copied to make the cars, planes and boats of the future. A team of …

item.title: The ultimate hangover cure
item.author: Emma S Lisle,
item.description: Could hangovers be a thing of the past? Scientists from the University of Huddersfield have developed a new drug that could reduce the side effects of binge drinking. The compound, called ethane-beta-sultam, is a taurine ‘pro-drug’ that can easily enter the blood stream before being processed by the …
